resources.string: This is a beautiful property to relax and enjoy to the view of arenal volcano in La Fortuna, San Carlos, Costa Rica. We have a nice location around Arenal Volcano hotels.

La Fortuna is one of the main tourist destinations in Costa Rica and Central America. In addition to its major attraction such as the Arenal Volcano. La Fortuna is a place that offers visitors a wide range of services and a variety of attractions near the Arenal Volcano.
